text: Aur jo maal Allah ne unke kabze se nikal kar apne Rasool ki taraf palta diye, woh aisey maal nahin hai jinpar tumne apne ghodey (horses) aur ount (camels) daudaye hon. Balke Allah apne Rasoolon ko jispar chahta hai tasallut (authority/galaba) ata farma deta hai. Aur Allah har cheez par qadir hai
